statements: SELECT * FROM customer_billing;
SELECT customer_name, total_bill FROM customer_billing WHERE total_bill > 100;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer_billing ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_billing WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT SUM(total_bill) AS total_amount FROM customer_billing;
SELECT * FROM customer_billing WHERE total_bill > 1000 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_bill FROM customer_billing WHERE customer_id IN (1, 5, 8) ORDER BY total_bill ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address, total_bill FROM customer_billing WHERE total_bill < 5000 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_billing WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' OR customer_name LIKE 'M%' ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_bill FROM customer_billing WHERE total_bill BETWEEN 2000 AND 5000 ORDER BY total_bill DESC, customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customer_billing;
SELECT * FROM customer_billing WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT customer_name, bill_amount FROM customer_billing ORDER BY bill_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_records WHERE payment_amount > 1000 AND payment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, payment_amount, payment_date FROM customer_billing JOIN payment_records ON customer_billing.customer_id = payment_records.customer_id WHERE payment_amount < 500;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address, bill_amount FROM customer_billing WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, address, bill_amount FROM customer_billing WHERE bill_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, address, payment_amount, payment_date FROM customer_billing JOIN payment_records ON customer_billing.customer_id = payment_records.customer_id;

SELECT customer_name, address, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payment FROM customer_billing JOIN payment_records ON customer_billing.customer_id = payment_records.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name, address;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address, bill_amount FROM customer_billing WHERE bill_amount < 500 ORDER BY customer_name DESC, bill_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerBilling;
SELECT customer_name, bill_amount FROM CustomerBilling ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM BillingHistory WHERE payment_status = TRUE;
SELECT customer_name, bill_amount FROM CustomerBilling WHERE bill_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, account_number FROM CustomerBilling ORDER BY account_number DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerBilling;
SELECT customer_name, bill_amount FROM CustomerBilling WHERE bill_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, bill_amount FROM CustomerBilling ORDER BY bill_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, amount_paid, payment_method FROM PaymentRecords PR JOIN CustomerBilling CB ON PR.customer_id = CB.customer_id;

SELECT CB.customer_name, BH.bill_amount, BH.billing_date FROM CustomerBilling CB JOIN BillingHistory BH ON CB.customer_id = BH.customer_id WHERE BH.payment_status = FALSE ORDER BY BH.billing_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT bill_amount, bill_date FROM BillingInformation ORDER BY bill_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM Customer WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT payment_amount FROM PaymentRecords WHERE payment_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customer WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT SUM(bill_amount) AS total_amount, AVG(payment_amount) AS average_payment FROM BillingInformation JOIN PaymentRecords ON BillingInformation.bill_id = PaymentRecords.bill_id;
SELECT customer_name, bill_amount, bill_date FROM Customer JOIN BillingInformation ON Customer.customer_id = BillingInformation.customer_id ORDER BY bill_date DESC;

SELECT customer_name, payment_amount, payment_date FROM Customer JOIN BillingInformation ON Customer.customer_id = BillingInformation.customer_id JOIN PaymentRecords ON BillingInformation.bill_id = PaymentRecords.bill_id WHERE payment_amount > 100 ORDER BY payment_date;
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM Customer WHERE customer_id=1;
SELECT meter_id, meter_type, install_date FROM Meter ORDER BY install_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, bill_amount FROM Customer JOIN Billing ON Customer.customer_id = Billing.customer_id WHERE Billing.bill_amount > 100;
SELECT meter_id, reading FROM Status WHERE status_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM Customer WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT Meter.meter_id, Meter.meter_type, Customer.customer_name FROM Meter INNER JOIN Customer ON Meter.customer_id = Customer.customer_id;

SELECT Billing.bill_id, Billing.bill_amount, Customer.customer_name, Payment.payment_amount FROM Billing INNER JOIN Customer ON Billing.customer_id = Customer.customer_id INNER JOIN Payment ON Billing.bill_id = Payment.bill_id;
SELECT * FROM Meter WHERE install_date > '2022-01-01';
